Name: Remallia Haventree
Traits: Special Equipment. Remallia has a figurine of wondrous power (silver raven). Arcane Ward. Remallia has a magical ward that has 30 hit points. Whenever she takes damage, the ward takes the damage instead. If the ward is reduced to 0 hit points, Remallia takes any remaining damage. When Remallia casts an abjuration spell of 1st level or higher, the ward regains a number of hit points equal to twice the level of the spell. This applies to any of the following spells she casts: alarm. mage armor, shield, arcane lock, counterspell, dispel magic, banishment, stoneskin, globe of invulnerability and symbol Fey Ancestry. Remallia has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put her to sleep. Spellcasting. Remallia is a 13th-level spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 16, +8 to hit with spell attacks).
